title: 230-Grimm: A Hairy Situation
itunes:title: 230-Grimm: A Hairy Situation
description:
A story from the Brothers Grimm about an evil king and a bad penny of a kid who's apparently unkillable. Oh, and prophesied to marry his daughter.

The creature is a squirrel who wants to surprise you and shove psychotropic substances up your nose.

--
